---
title: "FAQ"
---

## What is EML?

EML is an epidemiological machine learning project focused on reproducible observational modeling workflows for substance-use surveillance.

## What is published in this site?

The site publishes project summaries, module pages, script-level metadata, and public artifacts intended for transparent reporting.

## Does the site publish restricted data?

No. Private and restricted datasets are excluded from publication workflows.

## How are results reproduced?

Reproducibility details, runtime configuration, and module execution steps are documented in the Reproducibility section.
